lodash.isnumber v3.0.3
Installation

lodash.isnumber v3.0.3

The lodash method _.isNumber exported as a Node.js module.

Installation

Using npm:

$ {sudo -H} npm i -g npm
$ npm i --save lodash.isnumber

In Node.js:

var isNumber = require('lodash.isnumber');

See the documentation or package source for more details.
